review_analysis_shulex_tips.message: Powered by Shulex VOC with AI, which analyzes the text of reviews and identifies key phrases that indicate a customer's pain point.For more VOC features

review_analysis_ss_tips.message: Generate a comprehensive analysis report based on all reviews of this listing, including detailed information of each variant, review trends, etc.Please click here to see a sample report

quick_view_trends_amz_variant_tips.message: The sales data is based on Amazon public data. It represents each variation's sales.

quick_view_trends_variant_tips.message:
Variations: All variations of this product
SKU：It is used to identify product attribution details such as size, color, and any other pertinent information.
Price: Latest BuyBox price for each variant
Keywords: The number of keywords that made this ASIN appears on the first 3 search result pages in the last 30 days
Star Rating：Listing Rating Star
Number of Ratings：Total number of ratings
Reviews: Number of reviews for each variant
Review Ratio：The Ratio of this Child ASIN’s Reviews to Total Number of Reviews
FBA ：Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) fees are calculated per unit, based on size and weight of the product
Date Available: The earliest discovery date for each variant.

quick_view_trends_variant_sale_tips.message:
For monthly sales data, we have 2 calculations:
1. If Amazon has published the sales of the product, we will directly use the sales data published by Amazon;
2. Amazon does not publish sales data of the product. If the product's parent and child ASIN share the BSR rank, then it will estimate its sales in past 30 days through the BSR rank of the parent ASIN.

quick_view_trends_variant_sale_week_tips.message: Weekly sales data is from Amazon search page '400+ bought in past week'

quick_view_trends_station_tips.message:
Marketplace: Where this product is sold
Seller: Current BuyBox sellers
Price: Latest BuyBox price
Sales: Estimated sales for the last 30 days
Revenue: Estimated revenue of this product in the corresponding marketplace for the last 30 days
Star Rating：Listing Rating Star
Number of Ratings：Total number of ratings
FBA Fee：Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) fees are calculated per unit, based on size and weight of the product
Launch Time：The time of the earliest discovery of this ASIN

quick_view_trends_explorer_tips.message:
Keyword Phrase: Search terms that buyers click or purchase the given ASIN, and this ASIN is one of the most clicked ASINs in the search results.
Conversion: The conversion effects of this product for the associated keywords
ABA Rank: Search Frequency Rank，it is the rank (numeric) of a particular search term based on its weekly popularity
Rank Change: The number of ranks that the keyword has gained or lost this week
Rank Growth: The percentage representing the number of ranks that the keyword has gained or lost this week
Click Share: Percentage of clicks that the ASIN achieved in comparison to the total conversions based on the search results in the selected time frame.
Conversion Share: Percentage of conversions that the ASIN achieved in comparison to the total conversions based on the search results in the selected time frame.
Top 3 ASINs Concentration: Percentage of clicks that the top 3 clicked products received in comparison to the total clicks and conversions based on the search results in the selected timeframe.
Most-Clicked 3 ASINs: Information regarding the 3 ASINs most-clicked by consumers after entering this keyword

quick_view_trends_distribution_tips.message:
Product: All variations ASINs of this product
Keywords: The total number of keywords that made this ASIN appears on the first 3 search result pages in the last 30 days (de-emphasized)
Organic: This ASIN appears on the first 3 search result pages among organic results
AC: Amazon’s Choice is a label given to a product when Amazon believes it is the best match for a specific keyword
ER: The search terms for the ASIN appeared in the Editorial recommendations section
4+ Star: The search terms for the ASIN appeared in the 4+ star styles section
HR: The search terms for the ASIN appeared in the Highly rated section
SP: The search terms are the keywords this ASIN is using to run PPC advertising on Amazon
SP Video: The search terms are the keywords this ASIN is using to run video advertising on Amazon
SP Brand: Sponsored Brands are cost-per-click (CPC) ads that feature the brand logo, a custom headline and multiple products

quick_view_reverse_search.message: No data, please try other similar products！

With this feature, you can mine the full volume of reviews to quickly grasp product selling points, strengths and weaknesses, and usage scenarios.Learn more

goods_source_btn_tips.message: Find similar products on Alibaba (based on picture similarity)

choose_img_title_tips.message: Dear user, we’ve carefully selected high-quality 1688 product sources tailored for you (excluding potentially infringing or controversial products). To explore more, simply click the button on the right to view them on 1688

calculator_product_specifications_tips.message: Packaging parameters, including dimensions and weight.

calculator_volumetric_weight_tips.message:
Sea shipping volumetric weight: Length × Width × Height ÷ 6000 (units: cm).
Express air shipping volumetric weight: Length × Width × Height ÷ 5000 (units: cm).

calculator_small_and_light_program.message: Participate in Low-Price / the small and light terms or not

calculator_storage_time_tips.message: The duration the product is stored in Amazon’s warehouse.

calculator_storage_free_tips.message:
Amazon charges a standard monthly storage fee for all inventory stored in its warehouses. The fee varies based on product size tiers and the time of year.
Automatically calculates and fills based on product dimensions and entered storage duration.

calculator_return_threshold_tips.message: The threshold for return rates varies by category and is automatically filled based on the product category. Return processing fee is incurred when the return rate exceeds a specific threshold.

calculator_returns_processing_fee_tips.message:
Clothing and footwear items: Return processing fee applies to all returned items, regardless of whether the return rate exceeds the threshold.
Other products: Return processing fee is charged only for returns exceeding the threshold, automatically calculated based on the size and weight of the product.

calculator_per_item_fee_tips.message:
Individual sellers are charged $0.99 per item sold with no monthly subscription fee.
Professional sellers pay a monthly subscription fee of $39.99 and are not charged per item sold.

calculator_storage_cost_tips.message: Seller-incurred storage costs for self-stored products.

calculator_seller_fulfillment_cost_tips.message: Shipping and logistics costs incurred when sellers fulfill orders themselves.

calculator_return_num_tips.message:
The number of items sold on Amazon that have been returned.
Note: The number of returns cannot exceed the number of sales.

calculator_return_num_sales_tips.message: The quantity of returned items deemed fit for resale after evaluation by Amazon’s warehouse.

calculator_return_num_sales_max.message: Resellable returns cannot exceed the number of returns.
